text: Mieczysław Waśkowski (13 August 1929 - 14 November 2001) was a Polish actor and film director. He appeared in more than 20 films and television shows between 1955 and 1978. ==Selected filmography== * Zacne grzechy (1963) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1929 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Polish male film actors Category:Polish film directors Category:People from Białobrzegi County
title: Mieczysław Waśkowski
